attributes.action: Stop using schools as electoral polling stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Working parents are forced to take annual leave during elections where schools are used as voting stations in order to care for their children as out of school club (in my area anyway) do not take place on voting days.  Many parents have limited annual leave allowance anyway and some do not have the flexibility to take holiday when they want/need it  Consequently, they have to rely on family/friends/neighbours to look after their children or take unpaid time off.
